name: django-backend
description: Backend (Django) sources for the CS Toolkit
author: ZechyW

scripts.backup-lexicon: poetry run python manage.py dumpdata lexicon --format xml --indent 2 > lexicon/fixtures/lexicon.xml
scripts.backup-rules: poetry run python manage.py dumpdata grammar.RuleDescription --format xml --indent 2 > grammar/fixtures/rules.xml
scripts.backup-users: poetry run python manage.py dumpdata app_auth.AppUser --format xml --indent 2 > app_auth/fixtures/users.xml
scripts.dev: cross-env DJANGO_DEBUG=1 poetry run python manage.py runserver
scripts.predramatiq:
: "


=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
If you see an error below, you probably meant to run the `start-workers` script rather than start this task manually.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=


"
scripts.load-basic: poetry run python manage.py migrate && poetry run python manage.py loaddata lexicon rules users
